songs.title: Paradise
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]

Yea I apologize now if I get too loud
I'm in a cloud don't want to come down
I want to feel around
And with the unexpected pleasantries
Seconds turn into minutes, minutes turn into hours
I don't want to leave


[Hook]

Every time place to be
I for you and you for me
Never had a love so tight
Lost, lost in paradise

More you give, the more received
First to come, last to leave
Never had a love so tight
Lost, lost in paradise

[Verse 2]

They tasting the sweetest of sweets
I would of sworn it was a dream state
But I'm awake it's so real baby
They came in the warm of your crease
It's been a minute since I had a taste
I can't wait til we meet again

[Hook]


[Outro]

It's alright
It's alright
It's alright
I can't wait til we meet again


Thought that I lost you
Looking all over for you
Live in the moment
I just need a taste
[Repeat 2x]
